item.title: By: Tuyet
item.dc:creator: Tuyet
item.description: Just made these scrolls today, worked out great! Going to try the freezing tip too next time so I can have them straight out of the oven without all the effort before hand.
item.content:encoded: Just made these scrolls today, worked out great! Going to try the freezing tip too next time so I can have them straight out of the oven without all the effort before hand.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: These look lovely Anita! And the flowers are beautiful too. I love cinnamon sc/rolls...I have also found you can freeze them immediately after putting them onto the tray. Then when you are ready to bake, place the tray and frozen scrolls straight into the oven (off) the night before. By the morning they have defrosted and risen, ready to bake. YUM! :)
item.content:encoded: These look lovely Anita! And the flowers are beautiful too. I love cinnamon sc/rolls…I have also found you can freeze them immediately after putting them onto the tray. Then when you are ready to bake, place the tray and frozen scrolls straight into the oven (off) the night before. By the morning they have defrosted and risen, ready to bake. YUM! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Sofia
item.dc:creator: Sofia
item.description: Hi there, love visiting your blog for some yummy treats ;) These cinnamon scrolls look like the traditional Swedish "kanelbullar", which are made without frosting.... //Sofia
